purpose: Announcing the joint call for papers for the 29th ETAPS International Joint Conferences in 2026.
evidence_sentences: JOINT CALL FOR PAPERS 29th ETAPS International Joint Conferences On Theory and Practice of Software ETAPS 2026 Torino, Italy, April 11-16, 2026.
ETAPS 2026 is the twenty-nineth event in the series.
The four main conferences of ETAPS 2026 solicit contributions of the following types.
